modShortDescription: This mod modifies the trader so that their inventory refreshes and changes each day.
modDescription:
This mod modifies the [trader](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/) so that their inventory refreshes and changes **each day**.

## Changelog

Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-Magazine_Plants_Trader/tree/master/Trader_Refresh_1Day)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25784-magazine-schematics-skillpoints-e-to-pickup-plants-1day-trader-refresh-a20/).

**Credits:** [ShoudenKalferas](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shoudenkalferas/)
